pageContext.claim: “Even James Clapper has admonished John Brennan for having gone totally off the rails. Maybe Clapper is being nice to me so he doesn’t lose his Security Clearance for lying to Congress!”
pageContext.analysis: As {the Fact Checker} previously noted, some sloppy dot connecting leads to the assumption that Clapper briefed Tapper about the dossier in January 2017. No one has pinned down the exact date, but in the fuller transcript of Clapper's testimony, he says he only discussed it after it was in the media.
